marklogic.body:
WE WENT TO DINNER TO AVOID THE 'SOB'S' DIRGE, FORGOT TO TURN OFF THE TV AND CAME BACK TO FIND THE PARROT OUT COLD!
We went out to dinner. Â Obama nauseates my entire household, so I'm just catching up. Â And that includes the pets. Â Mr. Whiskers, the Cat, goes into narcolepsy at the mere sound of one of Obama's dirges and the dog, 'Puddles'...well....he puddles. Â Me too. Â I gather it's 'stimulus', blah, blah, blah,....social justice, blah, blah, blah and more double talk and more taxatiion. Â And he also had Trumka and Immelt in the audience, I understand, grinning and flailing at every opportunity. Â
He has NO SHAME. We revived the parrot and asked: "What is the plan?" 'Pinfeathers' looked at us and weakly croaked: "No plan!"
